message: Why are people engaging in constant anti-Muslim hate-fests? The problems in the African continent were, in the first instance, created by former European colonialists, who divided and ruled. They now divide and rule by stripping the continent of its precious resources, prop up corrupt African governments, and sell arms to different groups, so that they can all fight and kill each other. It is really pathetic for Africans to accuse Muslims of racism, when many, many Muslims are themselves African and/or brown/coloured. Instead of blaming Muslims, why not make your societies and communities strong, economically, so that Africans do not need to migrate to Europe? And, why not demand an end to all political corruption, which is the cause of great poverty in African countries? You know, it's really lovely to be an internet warrior, far harder to go out into the real world and make a difference for the better. Remember, people, that your expressions of such intense hate are manifestations of extremism - so, you are no better than the ones you condemn. As for you Prashant Sharma - a Hindu, by name - you should be ashamed of yourself. In India, baby girls are routinely aborted, because people want boys - for economic reasons. Rape is rampant and discrimination against females rampant. Stop pretending to a non-existent state of piety and purity - look after the women in your country, and do some good works, instead of spreading hate - because in doing so, you make all Hindus look like arrogant, ignorant fools. (Incidentally, stop believing all the anti-Muslim/Prophet Muhammad (pbuh)/Islam lies, propaganda and disinformation. Use your brains, and go do some study and research about Islam, instead of parrotting what you have read elsewhere. If Muslims want, we too can go dig out some anti-Hindu propaganda with which to bash you. but I will not descend to your level.)

When the American people spoke on November 8 it was heard around the world. The results of our election really interfered with their agenda. The left is VERY MAD about it and will come after us in full force. We need to stay strong. We need to keep our determination to have a great country alive. I fear that this is just the beginning of the trouble they are going to give us. We have a lot of work to do.

Israel is a Racist country. Take it from me, an Ethiopian Israeli ¡°Israel is one of the most racist countries in the world,¡± said Tahunia Rubel, an Ethiopian-born Israeli model and actress. The remarks by Rubel, who became famous on the Israeli version of ¡°Big Brother,¡± were published in the mass-circulation daily Yedioth Ahronoth last weekend. I¡¯ve spent 21 years in Israel, the total number of my years on earth, in a country totally different from the one where Israelis so angry at Rubel live. Rubel said things like ¡°We have a screwed-up government ¡¦ and the police are total idiots.¡± She added: ¡°People in Israel find it strange to see an Ethiopian woman who behaves like an Israeli.¡± According to a report this week by the Berl Katznelson Foundation, the interview stirred particularly violent posts on social networks. Israel commits racist crimes. A prominent example is the police violence during the demonstrations by young Ethiopian men and women a year ago. (Police violence, incidentally, isn¡¯t limited to young Ethiopians; many young Arabs encounter it as well.) Another example is the investigation that revealed the pressure on Ethiopian women to receive shots of the birth control hormone Depo-Provera before immigrating. So you belong to a minority and you want to express criticism? They¡¯ll immediately remind you that you shouldn¡¯t take for granted that you're here and will suggest that you return to your country of origin. That¡¯s if you¡¯re Ethiopian, of course, because leftist Israel-haters are sent to Berlin regardless of their ethnicity. From Haaretz website
